Articles.Content:
After performing a 180 and re-docking with another part of my ship, the camera and controls entirely break consistently.

As soon as I throttle up, the camera starts to drift away from the ship until its entirely out of view, and the ship starts to yaw heavily to one side until it starts uncontrollably spinning outside of my view. Almost as though the ship thinks it needs to turn one way to travel straight, when it doesn’t. Big waste of time as it happens so late into a mission.
